name: Good morning, high constable
description:
Produced for GMTK 2018: GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC.
This is a tower defense game without enemies, or rather a game for people who love governing bodies.

Even when you're struggling to keep with your employers demands, you have to keep building to protect your kingdom. Enemies could show up at any moment!

ERRATA: Whenever the general or diplomat mention northwest, they instead should say northeast. ^^'

Developed by Quinten Heijn and Victor Gladys
Special thanks to Juriaan Los for the mugshot spritework
UI audio by kenney.nl
